summary: Commander Logar fools Arif and sends him 1.000.000 years back in the time. He must civilize people from past to reach today.
cast: Cem Yilmaz|Özge Özberk|Zafer Algöz|Nil Karaibrahimgil|Hasan Kaçan|Özkan Ugur|Ozan Güven|Metin Keçeci|Muhittin Korkmaz|Raimundo Querido|Sercan Akyüz|Dilek Altunay|Ethel Mulinas Araf|Ilker Ayrik|Vedat Baltaci|Berkay Budak|Charles Carroll|Ridvan Dilmen|Ece Ercan|Ayvaz Gokdemir|Cem Korkmaz|Kadir Turan|Can Yilmaz|Sultan Örenkaya|Kagan Öztop
director: Directors: Ali Taner Baltaci, Cem Yilmaz
title: A.R.O.G
